body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service department. My name is James Watson and I'm here to assist you. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Sarah Carter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. Could you please provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you easily if needed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. And for verification purposes, could you also provide your date of birth, just the day and month, like one one, two three for November 23rd?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my date of birth is zero eight, zero four for April 8th.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Sarah. Is there anything specific you'd like assistance with today regarding our Car Dealership services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been experiencing some issues with the car I purchased from your dealership and I'm feeling a bit upset about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Sarah. Let's investigate this matter further to find a resolution for you. Thank you for sharing your concerns with us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sarah. Feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or need assistance. Have a great day.

body: Thank you for your time—I am glad to have been able to assist you with your concern. Have a great day!
